root.name: AC/DC
root.description: OverviewAvailable in Pro, Premium, and Limited editions, the AC/DC is a two-flipper table that features an open lower playfield with a portrait of Angus Young; based off the Highway to Hell album cover. The Premium and LE editions were revised to have an inset lower playfield (ala Black Hole) in place of the portrait.MusicThe machine features the following songs from the AC/DC library:Back in BlackFor Those About to RockHell Ain't a Bad Place to BeHells BellsHighway to HellLet There Be RockT.N.T.ThunderstruckRock 'N Roll TrainWar MachineWhole Lotta RosieYou Shook Me All Night Long
